Message:
This girl is
“the child of miracles.”

It’s rare, but I have
come across those who hold
either the power of an angel,
or that of a demon.
But, this is the first time
I’ve ever laid eyes on
a girl who possesses
the power of both.

Not only does she wield a soul
strong enough to withstand two
completely opposing powers,
those powers dwell
in harmony within her.

This girl doesn’t even
realize how much of
a miracle she truly is.

...No... This can’t possibly
all be a coincidence.

She is a miracle
that shouldn’t exist.
Someone made her this way.

To be able to save the world,
or destroy it...

What lies in store for this girl
is a destiny full of struggle.
It’s a fate no ordinary girl
could bear.

But, if she can face her destiny
without giving up,
and continue to push forward...

she’ll likely be more beautiful,
and shine brighter, than anyone.

I want to see her
reach that destiny...!

And, I have the ability
to give that girl...
